title: Only 85 bucks for an LED TV? That's right—people are stocking up on this 32-inch TV: 'I have four of them'
text:
The editors at Yahoo Lifestyle are committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. At times, we may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

Save $95 on this brilliant 32-inch TV. (Photo: Walmart/Yahoo Lifestyle) More

This is quite possibly the best TV deal we’ve seen: The Sceptre 32-inch HD LED TV is on sale for just $85—53 percent off at Walmart.

Usually going for $180, it features super-sharp images and shockingly bright colors. The TV comes with two HDMI ports for a Chromecast or Roku device, and features a QAM (quadrature amplitude modulation) tuner built-in — making it possible to pick up over-the-air channels without a digital antenna.

At 32 inches, it’s ideal for a bedroom or guest room. Some people, like the reviewer below, even use it as a computer monitor that can be mounted on a wall, which is great for clearing up desk space.

“The picture quality is excellent and the HD is perfect as a computer monitor,” says a five-star Walmart reviewer. “It can be mounted pretty much anywhere with an adjustable low-cost bracket, as it is much lighter than expected. I will finally have access to my desk. Overall, the quality is good. It also comes with a truckload of connection ports that will fit any setup. I don't think there is anything in a 32-inch unit that would be a better value for the price.”

With 4,300+ reviews, this TV has a 4.6 out of 5-star rating. (Photo: Walmart/Yahoo Lifestyle) More

Maybe you can use it in an RV, like this reviewer: “We bought this TV to replace a 32-inch Jansen in our RV. The picture and features are outstanding for the price. It has plenty of volume to hear over generator and air conditioner noise. After a little bit of use, I'll purchase another for home. So far, it’s great!”

Some Walmart reviewers have even purchased more than one: “I love these televisions, omg! They are perfect. I have four of them. I bought one about two years ago and it is still going strong. I bought two more and realized that I could use it as a computer monitor so I bought another one. I love the picture and sound. This is indeed a great buy.”

Shop it: Sceptre 32-inch Class HD LED TV, $85 (was $180), walmart.com

The reviews quoted above reflect the most recent versions at the time of publication.
